nodes.text: Jurgan Kalta's power suit was a custom powersuit created for the Zabrak mercenary, Jurgan Kalta, that made him near-invulnerable in battle. The armor provided a high level of protection to heat, cold, and sonic attacks, in addition to rendering the wearer immune to mind-altering attacks through the Force. It was believed that Revan may have acquired this powersuit at the end of the Jedi Civil War, during his search for the Star Maps.
